 2017-11992017-09-28PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
PrecisAppointment of GUY BUJOLD of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member and interim Vice-Chairperson of the Civilian Review and Complaints Commission for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months less one day.
